text: Maleek Irons (born June 29, 1996) is a professional Canadian football running back for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He was drafted in the third round, 22nd overall by the Tiger-Cats in the 2019 CFL Draft and he signed with the team on May 17, 2019. He played college football with the Ohio Bobcats from 2014 to 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Hamilton Tiger-Cats bio Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian football running backs Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Ohio Bobcats football players Category:Players of Canadian football from Alberta Category:Sportspeople from Calgary Category:American football running backs
title: Maleek Irons
